title: KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer - KHM512, Aqua Sky
descriptions:
### KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer - KHM512, Aqua Sky

#### Product Overview
Experience the power and precision of the KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer, model KHM512, in a beautiful Aqua Sky finish. This hand mixer is designed to make your kitchen tasks easier and more enjoyable, whether you're mixing cookie dough, whipping meringues, or stirring in chunky ingredients like nuts and chocolate chips.

#### Key Features
- **5 Speed Settings**: From slow stirring to high-speed whipping, the 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer offers versatile speed options to handle a variety of mixing tasks.
- **Lockable Swivel Cord**: The swivel cord ensures easy maneuverability and can be locked in place for storage, keeping your kitchen neat and organized.
- **Single-Handed Accessory Removal**: Quickly and easily remove the accessories with a simple press of a button, making cleanup a breeze.
- **Stainless Steel Turbo Beater Accessories**: Included with the mixer are two stainless steel turbo beaters that are durable and perfect for mixing heavy ingredients.
- **Dishwasher-Safe Accessories**: For added convenience, the accessories are dishwasher-safe, saving you time and effort.
- **Compact and Lightweight Design**: The mixer is designed to be compact and lightweight, making it easy to handle and store when not in use.

#### Suitable for:
- **Cookie Dough**: Perfect for mixing your favorite cookie recipes.
- **Mashed Potatoes**: Achieve smooth and creamy mashed potatoes with ease.
- **Whipping Egg Whites**: Get stiff peaks every time with the high-speed setting.
- **Whipping Heavy Cream**: Ideal for preparing whipped cream for desserts and beverages.
- **Mixing Nuts and Chocolate Chips**: Slowly stir in chunky ingredients without overmixing.

#### Brand Reputation
- **#1 MIXER BRAND IN THE WORLD**: According to Euromonitor International Ltd., KitchenAid is the leading mixer brand based on retail sales revenue across all retail channels. For more information, visit [mixerclaim.kitchenaid.com](http://mixerclaim.kitchenaid.com).

#### Additional Features
- **Speed 1**: Ideal for slowly stirring in chunky ingredients like nuts or chocolate chips.
- **Speed 5**: Perfect for whipping egg whites or heavy cream to a perfect consistency.

#### Design
- **Compact and Lightweight**: The design is both compact and lightweight, making it easy to use and store.
- **Aqua Sky Finish**: The Aqua Sky color adds a touch of elegance and modernity to your kitchen.

#### Customer Satisfaction
KitchenAid is committed to providing high-quality products that meet the needs of home cooks and bakers. The 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer is no exception, offering performance, reliability, and style.

#### Order Today
Enhance your baking and cooking experience with the KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer - KHM512, Aqua Sky. Order now and enjoy the convenience and power of this exceptional kitchen tool.
